price: 法老说：“如果你舍我而敬事别的神灵，我誓必使你变成一个囚犯。”
arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla la-ini ittakhadhta ilāhan ghayrī la-ajʿalannaka mina al-masjūnīna
